summary: It adds a bakery to the game...
descriptionHtml:
A new shop of candies and toys. And baking your own cakes!

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11033]Now ported to the Special Edition![/url][/b]

[b]Notes[/b]
- Find Cicci's Place in the way from Whiterun to the west...
- In order to baking cakes, you need to get a whisk and a rolling pin in your inventory.
- All the house and containers are safe.
- If you want to own the house, simply kill Cicci... :-)
- Fully voiced.
- No any DLC required.
- It tested for game patches from 1.7.x to 1.9.x.
- Lore friendly maybe. The new fruits and cocoa beans supposedly come from southern far lands...

[b]Changelog[/b]

[b]0.7[/b]
[x] Pumpkin and Samhain Cake.
[x] New furniture and items.
[x] More lighting.
[x] One new toy: Teddy Bear for Girls

[b]0.6[/b]
- More lightning.
- More furniture.
- More wine, with good and bad effects.
- Two new toys: Horse and dragon.

[b]0.5[/b]
- You can sleep in the bed.
- Dollhouses.
- Skeever Rag Doll
- Improved napkins, shells, harp and star collisions.
- Cicci sells an enchanted amulet: The golden apple.
- Some new furniture and decoration.
author: Runs
